description: Students learn basic performance practice on core instruments in each instrument family. Additional topics include: common performance issues and their possible solution; Best Practices in teaching and learning core instruments of the family; and technology for teaching, learning, or composing for instruments as appropriate. Offered annually in the fall semester. Prerequisite: permission of instructor required for students not majoring in theory/composition or music education.
name: Woodwind Techniques
notes: Open only to students majoring in music education or composition during web
registration; others may add on a space-available basis during the drop/add
period with the permission of the instructor.
prerequisites: permission of instructor required for students not majoring in theory/composition or music education.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: permission of instructor required for students not majoring in theory/composition or music education.
